com.daw.pms.Service.NeteaseCloudMusic

Interface NCMMVService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NCMMVServiceImpl

    public interface NCMMVService
    Service for handle mv in ncm.
    Since:
    7/24/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String convertMLogIdToVid(String mLogId, String cookie)
      Convert mlog id to vid.
      NCMDetailVideo getDetailMV(String id, String cookie)
      Get detail video information according to its id.

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailMV

        NCMDetailVideo getDetailMV(String id,
                           String cookie)
        Get detail video information according to its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of this video.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        The detail information of the mv id.
        API Note:
        mvid: GET /mv/detail?mvid=id | mlogId: GET /video/detail?id=id

      • getMVLink

        String getMVLink(String mvId,
                 Integer rate,
                 String cookie)
        Get the url of the mv.
        Parameters:
        mvId - The mvid of the mv.
        rate - The rate of the mv.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        MV's link with rate rate.
        API Note:
        GET /mv/url?id=mvId&r=rate

      • getMLogLinks

        Map<String,String> getMLogLinks(String mLogId,
                                String cookie)
        Get mlog's links.
        Parameters:
        mLogId - The mlog's id.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        The mlog's links, the key is resolution, the value is the corresponding link.
        API Note:
        GET /mlog/url?id=mLogId

      • getRelatedVideos

        List<BasicVideo> getRelatedVideos(Long songId,
                                  String mvId,
                                  Integer limit,
                                  String cookie)
        Get all related videos with song songId.
        Parameters:
        songId - The song's id.
        mvId - The mvid of the song.
        limit - The count of related videos returned.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        A list of related videos.
        API Note:
        GET /mlog/music/rcmd?songid=songId&mvid=mvId&limit=limit

      • convertMLogIdToVid

        String convertMLogIdToVid(String mLogId,
                          String cookie)
        Convert mlog id to vid.
        Parameters:
        mLogId - Mlog id.
        cookie - Your cookie for netease cloud music.
        Returns:
        The vid of the mlog.
